participant_1.background:
I enjoy eating at the local diner, it has great food and I always feel welcome.
I plan to relax on the weekend and not think too much.
I'll be making a batch of organic cat food for my kitty.
I once saw a moose cross the road while I was riding my bike.
I don't talk to my family anymore.

participant_2.background:
I lost my mom when I was a child.
i cannot get enough of lindsey spirlings music.
I've been hiding my financial troubles from my parents.
I'd brag about my famous stews that are always a hit at parties.
I am proud of being able to make my passion for music a reality, even though I have a day job.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
Hi there, I am doing well! How are you?
I am doing good too! I am planning to relax and not think too much this weekend.
That sounds like a good plan! I am going to be making a batch of organic cat food for my kitty.
That sounds great! I love animals, I have a dog of my own.
Oh that is nice! What breed is it?
He is a golden retriever, and he is my best friend.
Golden retrievers are so sweet! I lost my mom when I was a child, and I always think of her when I hear the song "Landslide" by Fleetwood Mac.
Oh that is such a beautiful song. I am sorry to hear about your mom.
Thank you. I am also proud of being able to make my passion for music a reality, even though I have a day job.
That is amazing! I am sure you are very talented.
Thank you! I am glad I am able to share my music with others.
That is great! I am sure your music brings joy to many people
